website_summaries.verdict: Comfort, performance, and versatility put it at the top of our list for the best value compression shirt Under Armour has to offer.
pros: Has a slick, fast-drying exterior and a warm brushed interior
Dual-layered fabric is ideal for cold weather activities
cons: Available in only 6 colors compared to the Sonic's 20 options

customer_reviews.title: Hugs you tighter than your mom does
customer_reviews.text: Def does its job of keeping me warm for winter workouts as the East Coast hit 10 degree weather these past few weeks. Wish it would be discounted since $50 is a little much compared to other options from Under Armour which range from $30 - $40 at times. However for that price tag it does as advertised and provides a conforming fit to keep one warm for the winter without feeling too baggy from layers of clothing. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Javi Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Order at least 2 sizes bigger. But really great shirt.
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my Husband. He had the same one already, so we knew, the sizing runs very small. He is usually a size M in T-shirts and Sweatshirts, but with this he is wearing a size XL. It keeps him warm in Alaska-temperatures. Snug fit. No sweating. Washes very easy. After lots of washes, it's still in perfect shape. Will order more, because that's the only brand that keeps him warm enough.
customer_reviews.author: Lila

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but move the UA under the collar to the breast side
customer_reviews.text: I wear these constantly under my other shirts. These are very comfortable and wish they would move the UA to the side vs underneath the collar. Makes it hard to wear these under other shirts without the gross "UA" logo exposed
customer_reviews.author: Erik Okerholm

customer_reviews.title: Great performance!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this crew neck over the mock neck style. For some reason I'm really sensitive to the slight pressure the mock places on my neck. Wore this for a Thanksgiving Day 5k in the rain and felt perfectly comfortable the whole time.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Best for cold weather sports
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my daughter to wear under her soccer jersey! It really helps with the cold weather. It is compression, so it fits right. Tight is what you want playing soccer. I got her a small and it works great. She is 5’6” 118lbs athletic build. I’d say if you were buying for a guy I’d go up a size unless you want it super tight.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Walker

customer_reviews.title: to small
customer_reviews.text: Way to small. Maybe its because Im not the kind of guy to wear tights but I couldn't even get my arms in. I always wear L or XL in tshirts. This xl is probably closer to small/medium. Returned item.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my son and they ended up being a good investment. We live in Utah and so I ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a dad and a coach. I bought this for my son and they ended up being a good investment. We live in Utah and so I don't have to tell you how cold it can get. It kept him warm, especially on days when you are playing and it is actually snowing.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Excellent base.
customer_reviews.text: Great for moderately cold weather(35-48 degree),fairly active day and as a base for colder days with low activity. It fits as expected and, for me, the compression seems to support muscles help with fatigue. Under Armour is my "go to" brand for cold weather undergarments.
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: Good for fall and winter grappling/brazilian jiu jitsu
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic to help keep me warm when the gym is cold. Wicks away moisture very effectively. Almost feels like micro fleece on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Well-fitting, wicks nicely
customer_reviews.text: This makes a great addition to my cold weather gear, especially for snowshoeing. The material wicks moisture away from my skin and helps keep me warm without becoming soaking wet with sweat. I probably will get another one before long.
customer_reviews.author: Grand Junction Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great Compression Shirt
customer_reviews.text: This shirt helps me stay warm when I exercise during the winter without overheating. The fit is tight and almost hard to put on and take off, so if you're not used to compression clothing be prepared. The fit is great though and not too tight to feel cumbersome during activities.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Great for layering
customer_reviews.text: These shirts are great for wearing under soccer shirts when the weather turns cold. My son is 6’ 135 pounds and the small fits him perfectly. He prefers this neck over the higher one. I line dry them. They last a long time that way.
customer_reviews.author: Egan’s Bruv

customer_reviews.title: Stay Warm this winter!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent winter wear. Keeps you nice and warm and feels great! Comfortable and not too constricting. I wear bone under a long sleeve t- shirt and it's perfect. No need for a bulky jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Nyxx

customer_reviews.title: Excellent base layer garment that minimizes sweating
customer_reviews.text: Nothing beats these in the cold, period. Excellent base layer garment that minimizes sweating, wicks away what sweat does form, and keeps you warm and dry. This and a windbreaking jacket will do you right down to 20 degrees. Add a hoodie and now you're down to zero.
customer_reviews.author: Dantebenuto

customer_reviews.title: A durable under layer that keeps you warm.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this coldgear layer. I work in construction, and on days around 30° my co-workers can't figure out why I don't need a coat. This base layer is the reason why!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Bear

customer_reviews.title: Great base layer
customer_reviews.text: Great base layer. Warm and flexible. I have changed over to a synthetic mid-layer and they worked very well together. They are not the most flattering. Emphasizes that I need to work out more on my belly.
customer_reviews.author: Keenan Brock

customer_reviews.title: What A Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: This fit a little smaller than the cold gear compression shirts I buy from UA. The price on this was too good to pass up.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Hornung

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful for my UPS guy
customer_reviews.text: As always under armor exceeds my expectations. This is a beautiful under shirt lined with warm fleece. Beware that it fits like skin so if u like it loose, look for items that are not compression fit.
customer_reviews.author: MstrssGrim

customer_reviews.title: Great Cold Weather Shirt
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is great for those cold winter days. When cold weather rolls in and I am working outside I make sure to have one of these shirts on under my regular clothes. It's also great to wear under a motorcycle jacket when riding on cool and or cold days. I highly recommend this shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt
customer_reviews.text: Under Armour always delivers what they promise - this is a great undershirt in the winter for my police officer husband.
customer_reviews.author: M. Villiger

customer_reviews.title: Muscle Man Shirt
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t exactly what I expected— more of a “ Muscle Man” shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Nanci

customer_reviews.title: Good price on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Typical good UA gear. I always look for deals on Amazon. I like the crew necks and stay away from the turtle and mock necks. Those strangle me. I have a big neck. The crew neck shirts give you room.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you warm
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son who work outside all day. He said it kept him very warm and almost hot in below 30 temps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: First time user really like it. Great for cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Love underarmour
customer_reviews.text: It works fine like the feel of it on my body
customer_reviews.author: JEFFERY COLBY

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and comfy
customer_reviews.text: On cold days this is the answer. As a base layer it does it's part and is super comfy
customer_reviews.author: Adam Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal
customer_reviews.text: I work in freezing temperatures and these keep me warm! Love them
customer_reviews.author: Wil

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping warm!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband. From past experience with Under Armour compression gear, I ordered one size up, and it fits my husband perfectly. This does a great job of keeping him warm on the cold winter days!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Just a solid shirt
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it for my daughter and it fits fine and works great as an undershirt for her referee uniform.
customer_reviews.author: O. Eric Norris

customer_reviews.title: BIG MAN REVIEW
customer_reviews.text: Big guy- usually wear a 3XL, but the 2XLT has the length I'm looking for. Definitely a tight fit, but that is why I wear UA in the first place. I will always order XLT if it is available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep warm in the winter.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandson who regularly walks their dog. It has been quite cold in the Midwest and he told me this has helped to keep him warm.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria M. Rivelli

customer_reviews.title: Absoutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite purchases online. Fits perfectly, long as it should be and a perfect base for my Fall jacket. Lasts the whole winter in SoCal however. That means high 30's and up. Mostly 40's here however so It's the only winter top garb I need.
customer_reviews.author: Gunslinger69

customer_reviews.title: Best baselayer
customer_reviews.text: One of the best base layers I've used. I never stray from a good thermal system when I expect to find myself in the freezing or near freezing temperature. I own a few pieces of UA gear and have nothing negative to say about any of them.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Labak

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately I have a tailor with a special machine for ...
customer_reviews.text: The problem with workout wear is the legs and sleeves are always too long. Fortunately I have a tailor with a special machine for shortening.
customer_reviews.author: International Man of Mystery

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It keeps me warm and tight. The size should be considered before order. Normally I wear M size of under armor (loose fit), but I buy L or XL for compression fit. L size is very tight and XL is a little tight for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I cannot say enough great things. This is everything it says it is ...
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough great things. This is everything it says it is and worth the money. One warning; purchase a size larger than you normally wear. When they say compression, they mean it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Healy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for anyone who works outside
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend who wears it under his uniform at work. Very warm and fits great!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Herzog

customer_reviews.title: Will be buying more!!
customer_reviews.text: This shirt fit perfectly. It conforms to your body shape and really fits as a second skin. It can be worn as is in the gym or out jogging. It is also useful outdoors as a it adds another layer of clothing to keep you warm without feeling baggy.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Fits great and feels great
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and feels great! My normal shirt size is a xxl, maybe a little loose. I'm 6'4", 260 pds. This fit was exactly for me, it's a snug fit but not too tight. Not constricting at all, and still long enough to extend past my waist and wrist. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Defpixel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I also bought the tights and all arrived quickly and fit well. Good experience.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley E. Garton

customer_reviews.title: WAY TOO SMALL. Even if you size up it's too small.
customer_reviews.text: although this item is supposed to be form fitting and close to the body, it is ridiculously small. A large is closer in size to an extra small and short too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: We wear this with my uniform this weekend in the ATL SSB tournament. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: DeMontro L. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shirt worked well for what I needed, basically thermal underwear, but it was on the tight end
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Cold gear compression shirt - UnderArmour
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, fast and what I wanted. Compression is mainly for people in shape so it shapes their body. I recommend ordering a size or two or if you got any hanging weight on your body.
customer_reviews.author: GrimDeity

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this shirt, apparently another teammate loved it too because it walked away after one use. Will be buying another, nice warm well made shirt great for under baseball uniform.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. Of course it's been a warm fall and I've only used it once, but it helped to keep me warm and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Davidowicz

customer_reviews.title: Solid buy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a ski trip, worked great as expected
customer_reviews.author: John McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Not as warm as you would expect for $50
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed that this doesn't keep you as warm as described. Especially for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: kbux

customer_reviews.title: The producet was excellent as expected but I had to return the item ...
customer_reviews.text: The producet was excellent as expected but I had to return the item because it was too small. When buying the COMPRESSION cold gear you should buy one size bigger than needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Warm and comfortable. I wore it in my Nepal trip
customer_reviews.author: Ngai Wai

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its under armor . It did have an odor until it was washed a couple of times
customer_reviews.author: Jess Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Love my under armour
customer_reviews.text: Biker. Love my under armour. Wear it as a base layer all the time in winter even during work.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H. Laco

customer_reviews.title: fits like I thought it would
customer_reviews.text: I gave a 4 rating, only because everything that is tighter is always a little too tight on my "gorilla forearms". lol
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for skiing. Only underwear used for skiing. No extra clothing needed for warmth. excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Will Mattingly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for those days when heavier weight protection is to much.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey T.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Base Layer
customer_reviews.text: Great base layer for being outdoors in cold or chilly weather.
customer_reviews.author: SkiNewEngland

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These really help keep my husband warm during the cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than normal. Although it says free returns, there is a $4 charge for the label.😒
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is it is comfortable and I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Ray T Manning Jr

customer_reviews.title: this is a great base layer but I would suggest a good sweater ...
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be warmer. Don't get me wrong, this is a great base layer but I would suggest a good sweater or fleece to wear in top of this layer.
customer_reviews.author: MARC LEONARD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits a little tight, but so worth it. It is very warm and very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Charles A.

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. I wear a size medium and I couldn’t even get this shirt over my head
customer_reviews.author: Keith Joy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have several of these from department stores same size but this could fit a child, not adult.
customer_reviews.author: kl

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: Ripped at the seams within the first month. Amazon denying return.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: great fit for big body
customer_reviews.text: Fits great...not easy to find shirts that don't ride up on my body type ( round )....this one does..nice and long so it stays tucked in..
customer_reviews.author: CARL REGOLINO

customer_reviews.title: Amazing as usual from UA's coldgear line 3 degree wind ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing as usual from UA's coldgear line 3 degree wind chill and still warm inside with this as a base layer
customer_reviews.author: Jack D.

customer_reviews.title: Under Armour quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality as expected from the Under Armour brand. Washes well. Fit my son perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: T. JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: Keeping My UPS Guy Warm....
customer_reviews.text: This is also a Christmas gift for my Son and I am praying it will fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this shirt. Keeps him warm during hunting season
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Gotta love Under Armour
customer_reviews.text: Gotta love Under Armour, keeps you warm in winter and cool in summer, the large size was too small however.
customer_reviews.author: Don Wettlaufer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My boys love this gear! Perfect for cold weather under gear for baseball, golf and east coast.
customer_reviews.author: jwalton

customer_reviews.title: Warm and prevents chafing
customer_reviews.text: My husband is pleased - he reports no nipple chafing for distances up to nine miles. Warm - he can run with just this layer on in 30* weather.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany McCurley

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my husband as he hates bulky clothing ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband as he hates bulky clothing but needed something warm for the cold weather. He loves it and it fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Joan M.

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had discovered this years ago..
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Works awesome for working outside in the cold and snowboarding.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This compression wear is great for the winter season. It fits perfectly and keeps you warm.
customer_reviews.author: tenzin

customer_reviews.title: Waaaaaay too small.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I know this is a compression shirt, but the thicker material means it has zero give. An XL was cutting off circulation in my arms. I've been wearing the UA HeatGear shirt in XL for the last 4 years and I thought UA might have something close to standard sizing for their products. I was sorely mistaken. It's also super short, like about 4 inches shorter than the HeatGear of the same size. In short, if you wear an XL in the HeatGear, you will not fit in the ColdGear of any size. Maybe a XXXXL, but it would still be too short for a 6 foot man.
customer_reviews.author: Jem

customer_reviews.title: Great product for cold weather
customer_reviews.text: Amazing fit kept me warm in 17 degree weather wouldn't wear in the summer tho lol
customer_reviews.author: Dal Williams

customer_reviews.title: Go to for cold weather
customer_reviews.text: We own many of these. Best shirts for football, hockey and skiing or whatever. An excellent first layer. Washes well.
customer_reviews.author: WindsorON

customer_reviews.title: It feels great. I'm sure it keeps you warm
customer_reviews.text: It feels great. I'm sure it keeps you warm. But in all other Under Armour products I wear a LARGE. So I bought a LARGE from this product, and I couldn't even put it over my head. I bought the XL and it was still small. I guess I'll try the XXL and if that's too small then I give up.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Way to keep you warm in cooler days. Just keep it in mind that it is very fitted.
customer_reviews.author: Christislife

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very great product, I'm outdoors in - degree weather and the ha brand us amazing!
customer_reviews.author: sbn

customer_reviews.title: ... for extra warmth and said that it kept him nice and
customer_reviews.text: Husband wore this under his naval uniform during the winter for extra warmth and said that it kept him nice and toasty
customer_reviews.author: Knytemare

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: Runs very small. I know the fit is suppose to be tight, but my Son could not even get it over his head. He has several Under Armour shirts & jackets in medium, but this was just to small.
customer_reviews.author: Donna A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was a little tighter than the others of the same size.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen119

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cold Gear
customer_reviews.text: very tight and warm compression , good for layering playing golf
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase! Just remember to remove the tag off ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase! Just remember to remove the tag off to the side or it will give you pretty bad blisters during a long distance run.
customer_reviews.author: Ronster

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Works very well in cold weather. Tried it out in the mountains and was very pleased with it. I would recommend it
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: I bought a size larger than my son-in-law would wear ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size larger than my son-in-law would wear and it was too small so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Becky F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: need to order one size larger than normal for correct fit.and i did this.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Feel warm but sleeve length had a little bit long
customer_reviews.author: Osiris

customer_reviews.title: and durable undergarment that feel great to wear
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is; A quality made, warm, and durable undergarment that feel great to wear.
customer_reviews.author: CFD

customer_reviews.title: Iloveit
customer_reviews.text: It's just the right size, high quality and inexpensive is very warm.
customer_reviews.author: fengdxn

customer_reviews.title: Works great for winter sports!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the cold and for sports. I play the midfielder position in soccer and do tons of running. This helped me stay warm from the start.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cold weather gear
customer_reviews.text: These were for my son who's a walking mailman. He needed these fir the cold weather. He loves them. Great price, excellent wear, will buy again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Little more snugg than I was expecting. But well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: runs small
customer_reviews.text: Runs small. My husband wears a large and we ordered an XXL. The large was VERY tight. Dame for the matching long johns.
customer_reviews.author: KJ McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Under Armour cold gear always comes through. First class fit and look.
customer_reviews.author: juabwasp1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little tighter than expected. Still though, quite warm on a 75mph motorcycle ride.
customer_reviews.author: richard luke farnam

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Not Warm
customer_reviews.text: The fit on these is fine but my wife bought them for me to plow snow with and work outside. They are not warm at all. I am surprised at when you first step out in zero degree weather the fabric is cold. The more you work then they warm up but the more I work old long john would warm up and they're a lot cheaper. They're very well made but not worth all the hoopla in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Kug

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them received them today. Getting ready to order more. Very fast service and nice products.
customer_reviews.author: jeannie eid

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Ua ColdGear Compression Crew
product_meta.description: Dual-layer fabric with an ultra-warm, brushed interior & a smooth, fast-drying exterior. 4-way stretch construction moves better in every direction. Material wicks sweat & dries really fast . Anti-odor technology prevents the growth of odor-causing microbes. Smooth, chafe-free flatlock seam construction. ARMOUR wordmark on back neck.
feature_bullets: Dual layer fabric with an ultra warm, brushed interior & a smooth, fast drying exterior
4 way stretch construction moves better in every direction
Material wicks sweat & dries really fast
Anti odor technology prevents the growth of odor causing microbes
Smooth, chafe free flatlock seam construction
